name: Bowdoin Dining for Google Chrome
tagline: A Chrome Extension for Bowdoin Students to access their dining hall menus.
body:
### Bowdoin Dining Chrome Extension
![](http://bowdoin-dining.herokuapp.com/extension/images/Capture2.png)
This extension for Google Chrome provides access to Bowdoin College's Dining Hall menus. It uses a combination of Javascript and PHP to scrape menu information from Bowdoin Dining's own website, format it, and present it in a nice wrapper for Google Chrome.

Download the extension from the Chrome WebStore, [here](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/bowdoin-dining/dcjblleddepffojlckgcndpddblnjacf).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
